title: Two vaccine trials show promising results, but there's still a long way to go
author: KMGH Channel 7
description: "That, I think, is very reassuring that you have two independent experiments that have come to the same conclusion, that the conclusion is real," said Thomas Campbell, the chief clinical research officer for UCHealth and the associate dean for clinical research at the University of Colorado School of Medicine.
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: Home News Two vaccine trials show promising results, but there's still a long way to go back to News minute read Within a week of one another, two major pharmaceutical companies have announced positive early results from their COVID-19 vaccine trials.
